scripts.dev:tunnel: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'if [ -n "${SSL_KEY_PATH}" ] && [ -n "${SSL_CERT_PATH}" ]; then origin="https://127.0.0.1:${PORT:-4321}"; echo "cloudflared origin: $origin (self-signed TLS)"; cloudflared tunnel --url "$origin" --no-tls-verify --no-autoupdate; else origin="http://127.0.0.1:${PORT:-4321}"; echo "cloudflared origin: $origin"; cloudflared tunnel --url "$origin" --no-autoupdate; fi'
